mapper.select: select month(createTime) aMonth,count(*) aCount,year(createTime) aYear from sys_blog where year (createTime) = #{year} group by month(createTime) ORDER BY month(createTime) DESC

select b.id,b.title,b.subtitle,b.author,b.tagId,c.classify, b.click,b.cover,b.content,b.createTime from sys_classify c,sys_blog b where year (createTime) = #{aYear} and c.id = b.classifyId and month(createTime) = #{aMonth} ORDER BY year(createTime) DESC,month(createTime) DESC
